pages.text: $(italic)You found a huge underground structure that seemed like an underground fortress of a civilization that lived far before you.$(br)Although they seemed to have technology that allowed them to open a portal to another world, they definitely should have done something about their vermin problem.
Gets rid of Silverfish when breaking Invested Blocks.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Resonance.
